display_title.display_title:
Pakistan - Indus basin Project :
            supplemental loan agreement

docna.cdata!:
Pakistan - Indus basin Project :
            supplemental loan agreement

repnme.cdata!:
Pakistan - Indus basin Project :
            supplemental loan agreement

abstracts.cdata!:
In this Supplemental Loan Agreement to
            the Indus Basin Project, Pakistan accepts the arrangement
            set forth as a full and complete discharge of all
            obligations, whether legal or moral, expressed or implied,
            of the other Parties under the 1960 Agreement. Second, the
            Agreement delineates the priorities of the Indus Basin
            Development Fund. Any foreign exchange remaining after
            monies for the program are disbursed will be disbursed as
            needed according to procedures agreed upon between Pakistan
            and the Bank for the foreign exchange cost of the Tarbela
            Project or some other development project/s in the water and
            power sector of West Pakistan as provided.
